ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Not really. Didn't learn a lot.

The lack of slides and visual aid during class really hurt this course. A picture is worth a thousand words, and Prof Gelernter could have saved a few by preparing presentations instead of drawing or describing general UI concepts.

Do not take this class. It was awful. Gelernter stopped putting effort into preparing his lectures after about two weeks. Instead of talking about design, we had random rants about politics, grammar and sustainability.
Very good. Even though I had worked for 2 years in UI development, this course offered a very unique perspective to designing UIs. I would recommend it to anybody going into UI design or development

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It didn't at all. I learned nothing.
